00014 #include <Auxiliary/Macros.hpp>

00018 template<class T> class HeapObject : public NonCloneable {
00019     public:
00021         inline HeapObject(T *data) : m_data(data) { }
00022         inline HeapObject() : m_data(0) { }
00023         virtual inline ~HeapObject() { delete m_data; }
00024 
00026         inline void Attach(T *data) { delete m_data; m_data = data; };
00027 
00029         inline T* operator()() const { return m_data; }
00030 
00031     private:
00032         T *m_data;
00033 };
00034 
00036 template<class T> class HeapArrayObject {
00037     public:
00039         inline HeapArrayObject(T *data) : m_data(data) { }
00040         inline HeapArrayObject() : m_data(0) { }
00041         inline ~HeapArrayObject() { delete [] m_data; }
00042 
00044         inline void Attach(T * data) { delete [] m_data; m_data = data; };
00045 
00047         inline T* operator()() const { return m_data; }
00048 
00049     private:
00050         T *m_data;
00051 
00052         inline HeapArrayObject(const HeapObject<T> &heap_object) { ASSERT_DEBUG(FALSE); };
00053         inline HeapArrayObject& operator=(const HeapObject<T> &heap_object) { ASSERT_DEBUG(FALSE); return *this; };
00054 };
